abstract: The Chinese refiner Sinopec is said to be in preliminary talks on acquiring the Canadian oil and gas exploration company Addax Petroleum.
snippet: The Chinese refiner Sinopec is said to be in preliminary talks on acquiring the Canadian oil and gas exploration company Addax Petroleum.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese refiner Sinopec is said to be in preliminary talks to acquire Addax Petroleum, the Canadian oil and gas exploration company, The Associated Press reported, citing local media.

headline.main: Sinopec Eyes Oil Explorer in Canada
